mapper.select: SELECT info.recipe_no,info.member_id,info.recipe_name, info.recipe_category, info.recipe_time, info.recipe_level, info.recipe_img, info.recipe_scrap_cnt , mem.member_nickname FROM recipe_info info JOIN member mem ON info.member_id = mem.member_id ORDER BY recipe_dt desc

SELECT DISTINCT info.RECIPE_NO FROM RECIPE_INFO info LEFT OUTER JOIN RECIPE_INGRE IG ON INFO.RECIPE_NO = IG.RECIPE_NO WHERE info.recipe_name LIKE '%${word}%' or (ig.recipe_ingre_name LIKE '%${word}%' and ig.recipe_ingre_type LIKE '%재료')
SELECT recipe_no FROM scrap WHERE member_id= #{member_id}

SELECT info.recipe_no, info.member_id,recipe_intro, recipe_name, recipe_category, recipe_time, recipe_level, recipe_img, recipe_scrap_cnt, recipe_cnt, recipe_dt, recipe_status, recipe_ingre_no, recipe_ingre_name, recipe_ingre_metering, recipe_ingre_type, recipe_step_no, recipe_step_text, recipe_step_img, recipecmt_no, c.member_id cmtmember_id, recipecmt_detail, recipecmt_dt FROM recipe_info info JOIN recipe_process pro ON(info.recipe_no=pro.recipe_no) JOIN recipe_ingre ingre ON(info.recipe_no=ingre.recipe_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN recipe_comment c ON(info.recipe_no = c.recipe_no) WHERE info.recipe_no = #{recipe_no} ORDER BY recipe_ingre_no ASC , recipe_step_no ASC , recipecmt_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCRAP (scrap_no, member_id, recipe_no, scrap_dt) VALUES (SEQ_SCRAP.nextval,#{member.member_id},#{recipeinfo.recipe_no},SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO recipe_comment (recipecmt_no,recipe_no ,member_id, recipecmt_detail, recipecmt_dt) VALUES (SEQ_RECIPECMT.nextval,#{recipeinfo.recipe_no},#{member.member_id}, #{recipecmt_detail},SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO recipe_info (recipe_no, member_id, recipe_name, recipe_intro, recipe_category, recipe_time, recipe_level,recipe_img ,recipe_dt) VALUES(seq_recipe.nextval, #{member.member_id}, #{recipe_name}, #{recipe_intro}, #{recipe_category}, #{recipe_time},#{recipe_level}, #{recipe_img}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO recipe_ingre (recipe_no, recipe_ingre_no, recipe_ingre_name, recipe_ingre_metering, recipe_ingre_type) VALUES(seq_recipe.CURRVAL,SEQ_RECIPE_INGRE.NEXTVAL,#{recipe_ingre_name}, #{recipe_ingre_metering}, #{recipe_ingre_type})

INSERT INTO recipe_info (recipe_no, member_id, recipe_name, recipe_intro, recipe_category, recipe_time, recipe_level,recipe_img ,recipe_dt) VALUES(#{recipe_no}, #{member.member_id}, #{recipe_name}, #{recipe_intro}, #{recipe_category}, #{recipe_time},#{recipe_level}, #{recipe_img}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO recipe_ingre (recipe_no, recipe_ingre_no, recipe_ingre_name, recipe_ingre_metering, recipe_ingre_type) VALUES(#{recipe_no},SEQ_RECIPE_INGRE.NEXTVAL,#{recipe_ingre_name}, #{recipe_ingre_metering}, #{recipe_ingre_type})
